title: Sophisticated Great Ocean Road Suite Stay with Daily Breakfast, Spa Credit & Heated Indoor Pool
description:
Between kangaroo-filled bushland and Victoria’s spectacular coastline stands this family-friendly resort, perfectly positioned in the picturesque town of Anglesea. Just a 10-minute drive from Torquay, the region’s most iconic surf spot, Great Ocean Road Resort offers everything you need to explore the lush eucalyptus rainforests, pristine limestone beaches and exceptional local producers along one of Australia’s most beloved tourist routes. Return to a soul-warming heated indoor pool, top-notch treatments at Lux Spa & Wellness and modern Australian plates made with locally sourced ingredients at The Coast Restaurant.

Journey just two hours to reach the jaw-dropping Twelve Apostles or savour Anglesea’s abundance of delights, including cosy cafes, upscale boutiques, a beautiful beach, Anglesea Golf Club and some of Victoria’s best bushwalks.
offer_address: 105 Great Ocean Rd, Anglesea 3230 VIC Australia
